notAllowHtmlBlockScript: (code-tabs) please turn on: Allow execution of scripts within HTML blocks,  otherwise tabs will not be displayed properly
fixAllTabs: Fix all code-tabs in current document
codeStyleChange: code background or style changes and reconfigure code-tabs stylesheet
errMsgGetBackground: code-tabs: Please open a document and change the theme or mode again!!!
noSelectedCodeBlock: Please select a code block and try again
headErrWhenCheckCode: Tabs should start with :::, like ::: title | lang | active
fixAllTabsErrMsg: An error was thrown during the fix, please check the custom attribute of the block
tabToCodeInDocument: Convert all code-block to code-tabs in current document
allTabsToCodeCompleted: Convert all code-tabs to code-block completed, success count
allTabsToCodeCompletedFailed: Convert all code-tabs to code-block completed, failed count
codeToTabsInDocument: Convert all code-block to code-tabs in current document
noTabsToUpgrade: No legacy code-tabs found to upgrade
name: SiYuan
